scripts.install:all: npm run install:server && npm run install:client
scripts.hotel-init-dev:client: cd client && hotel add "npm run start-dev" index.js
scripts.hotel-init-dev:server: cd server && hotel add "npm start" server.js
scripts.hotel-init-dev: npm run hotel-init-dev:client && npm run hotel-init-dev:server
scripts.hotel-init-prod: npm run hotel-init-prod:client && npm run hotel-init-prod:server
scripts.postinstall-dev: npm run install:all && npm run hotel-init-dev
scripts.postinstall-prod: npm run install:all && npm run hotel-init-prod
